/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass and steel facades reflecting the overcast sky. The roads are filled with cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and yellow, possibly due to the overcast weather conditions or the city's infrastructure.
